contentList.content: Warforged
Built to fight, Warforged are made from wood and metal, but they can feel pain and emotion. Warforged can be a steadfast ally or a cold-hearted killing machine./
Envoy Warforged
Envoy Warforged are built with a certain specialized function in mind. They are the rarest of warforged, and are often very unique.
Juggernaut Warforged
Juggernaut Warforged are imposing war machines built for combat and raw power.
Skirmisher Warforged
Skirmisher Warforged are built to quickly and quietly scout a battle and outmaneuver their oponents. They are nimble and designed for speed.
Integrated Protection
You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.
Constructed Resilience
You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and have resistance to poison damage.
Forged Disposition
You are immune to disease, and magic can't put you to sleep.
Specialized Design
One ability score increases by 1. Gain a skill proficiency and weapon proficiency of your choice.
Mechanical Comprehension
Gain Darkvision and cast Detect Thoughts after a long rest.
Powerful Build
Gain +1 Strength. Increases carry capacity by 40%.
Iron Fists
When you make an unarmed strike, deal an additional [1] bludgeoning damage.
Light Step
Gain +1 Dexterity, increase movevement speed by 1.5m/5ft, and add your proficiency bonus to stealth checks.
Sworn to the Raven Queen's service, the mysterious Shadar-Kai originate from Shadowfel. Once fey, they have lost their vibrance and emotion.
Racial Proficiency
Uses of Racial Proficiency Bonus Features
Blessing of the Raven Queen
Magically teleport up to 9m to an unoccupied space you can see.
This creature has resistance to all damage until the start of its next turn.
You gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn after using Blessing of the Raven Queen.
Necrotic Resistance
You have Resistance to Necrotic Damage, and take half as much damage from Necrotic attacks.
